headline: CoverGirl Makes Big Bet on Influencers to Revive Brand Built With Supermodels
summary: Coty turns to social-media influencers for growth of its drugstore makeup brand and ‘clean’ beauty pioneer navigating a slowdown in U.S. sales.

raw.headline: CoverGirl Makes Big Bet on Influencers to Revive Brand Built With Supermodels
